name: Slime Frenzy
description:
Something happened and elemental slimes decided to attack you. Prevent your death by shooting magic attacks! 

Tip: remember the element matters. 

 How to play:

  1.  Move Press, W, A, S, D to move your character around.
  2.  Aim: Use your mouse to aim where to shoot.
  3.  Fire: Press your mouse's Left Button to fire a magic attack.
